text: The 2005 Canadian Senior Curling Championships were held March 19 to 27 at the East St. Paul Curling Club in East St. Paul, Manitoba. The winning teams represented Canada at the 2006 World Senior Curling Championships. ==Men's== ===Teams=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Province / Territory ! Skip ! Third ! Second !
